## Conversation that answers the provided questions:
**User:**
I need some help with shielding my transactions in Verus. How do I do it?

**AI Assistant:**
Shielding your coinbase transactions in Verus is a straightforward process. To do it, click "Send" and select the option to "Shield all recent coinbase transactions". Then, paste your "zs" address in the "Send To" field and click "Shield Funds". After a few seconds, it will complete, and you can click "Make Another Transaction" to return to the main Send screen. Do you have any questions about this process?

**User:**
That makes sense, but what do I need to do before I can unshield my transactions in Verus?

**AI Assistant:**
Before you can unshield your transactions in Verus, you need to wait for at least 1 confirmation on the shielding transaction. You can check the confirmations on the "Transactions" screen. Once you've got at least 1 confirmation, you're good to go!

**User:**
Okay, got it. How do I unshield my transactions in Verus?

**AI Assistant:**
To unshield your transactions in Verus, go to the "Send" screen and choose the "Send from a private address" option. Select the private address with the balance you just shielded, paste your Transparent address into the "Send To" field, and choose the amount you want to unshield. Then, click the Send button and confirm. That should do it!
How do I shield my coinbase transactions in Verus?

To shield your coinbase transactions in Verus, click "Send" and select the option to "Shield all recent coinbase transactions". Then, paste your "zs" address in the "Send To" field and click "Shield Funds". After a few seconds, it will complete, and you can click "Make Another Transaction" to return to the main Send screen.

Step 3
Now you’re ready to Shield your coinbase transactions…the mined or minted coins. Click “Send” and select the option to “Shield all recent coinbase transactions”. Then paste your “zs” address in the “Send To” field and click “Shield Funds”…you’ll come to a confirmation screen, check that your “zs” address is correct and click “Confirm”:After a few seconds it will complete and you can click “Make Another Transaction” to return to the main Send screen.
Step 4
After the coins have been shielded and at least 1 confirmation reached on that transaction, you can Unshield them. To check confirmations, go to the “Transactions” screen and wait for at least 1 confirmation.
Next, you’re ready to Unshield. For this step, you’re sending from a Private address, the “zs” address you just shielded to…to a Transparent address, where it will stake. Copy the Transparent address you want to use, from your “Receive” screen in Verus Agama by clicking the 3 vertical dots next to the Transparent (public) address where you want your staking balance to be…and copy pub key.
Then return to the “Send” screen and choose the “Send from a private address” option. Choose your private address with the balance you just shielded, paste your Transparent address (begins with “R”) into the “Send To” field and for Amount choose All (or an amount you want to unshield to a UTXO). Then click the Send button…Confirm…and you’re set!
./raw_text_input_medium/How to Earn VRSC Mining with Your CPU and Staking Mined Coins!-2019-01-11 19:50:07
